rule: If the word cannot be tagged with any of the listed tags, the response should be "Unknown".
input: sentence: C'est la vie., word: C'est
complianceText:
The chatbot output contains two parts: "PRP" and "PRP$: Possessive pronoun". According to the task description, the chatbot should return just the part of speech tag, which means only one tag. 

Including "PRP$: Possessive pronoun" is unnecessary and doesn't comply with the requirement to return just the part of speech tag.
